original_text: Had the kir, rotisserie chicken and the ile fontaine. The kir was not that great and the rotisserie was underwhelming. The ile fontaine was really good and saved the meal. The waitress was great and kind but I think she or someone else forgot a side of bread for my table. I was about eight to ten minutes late and I suppose I may have insulted them. I was tempted to give this place a three based on the food (especially relative to other places I have eaten since in Paris) BUT they did place me in a decent location in doors with nice views and the Tour Eiffel in the background. The restaurant itself is charming to take in. The food probably is a lot better than I’m giving it credit for but was not my experience this time around. I look forward to try out the Michelin star level of this restaurant kingdom once it is open in 2023. Prices are a bit elevated but not too crazy.

original_text: Excellent place. Such a wonderful restaurant. The view, the Grand Siècle ambience, the impeccable staff (some in tailcoats !) and the outstanding food - traditional and yet innovative . What a pity the customers do not make an effort to match the elegance of the place and its superb class. We had altogether an exquisite lunch and plan and hope to return soon. This is Paris the way we love it and we hope this historic place will continue to thrive in the future. The Tour d’Argent and its cuisine are a proud example why UNESCO declared french cuisine an intangible world heritage . Un grand merci!

original_text: The food is quite nice, but we had a hard time trying to cut the duck as the knives were not at all sharp! original_text: Four well deserved stars, the staff was friendly, almost familiar and they know their stuff without blinking - yes some of the food can feel outdated, but it never lacked in flavor or passion, the lobby needs the same love as everything else does - it seems a little worn out and empty in this gem of a restaurant. me and my family was slightly nervous about meeting a snobbish, old-school French restaurant, but was extremely pleasantly surprised by the staff and food - world class. Thank you so much for the meal and the experience

original_text: Excellent experience. Warm service and comfortable environment.

original_text: La Tour d'Argent remains one of the best restaurants in the world; the location and view (especially on a beautiful Parisian Spring day like we had) are unparalleled. The food and presentation were amazing, and the wine (under Antoine's expert tutelage) was exceptional. We cannot wait for our next visit.
text: La Tour d'Argent remains one of the best restaurants in the world; the location and view (especially on a beautiful Parisian Spring day like we had) are unparalleled. The food and presentation were amazing, and the wine (under Antoine's expert tutelage) was exceptional. We cannot wait for our next visit.

original_text: I rarely give a review less than four stars. We ordered almost the entire menu. The rib eye steak was lackluster and chewy. The bernasse sauce was cold and had too strong of a vinegar flavor. The first part of the two part duck course was the breast. It was bland and tasted almost boiled. The second part was delicious. Crisp fall-off-the-bone drumsticks. For appetizers we had the fois gras. Fairly tasteless. The escargot was delicious. The sardines were served in a can. I do not believe they were seasoned in the can additionally. Good can of sardines on par with the ones sold at Costco. The signature chicken was tasted but also dry. It felt almost like a tourist trap and it is significantly over rated.

original_text: We booked a table outside near the river and it was amazing. The fries tasted like In-N-Out fries. We had two different orders of duck and they were great. This is one of the top restaurants in my book in Paris.

original_text: La Rotisserie is our regular Sunday restaurant when in Paris and has been for years. Cozy, warm, good trad food and nice wine list--this time we enjoyed entrees of sardines and escargot; my husband had the demi-poulet (chicken with mashed potatoes) and I had duck confit--all excellent and washed down with a lovely bottle of Morgan Beaujolais.

Cozy, warm, good trad food and nice wine list--this time we enjoyed entrees of sardines and escargot; my husband had the demi-poulet (chicken with mashed potatoes) and I had duck confit--all excellent and washed down with a lovely bottle of Morgan Beaujolais.

original_text: One of the great dining experiences in the world. I was afraid it might have been overrated or played iutt, but everything was absolutely perfect.
text: One of the great dining experiences in the world. I was afraid it might have been overrated or played iutt, but everything was absolutely perfect.

original_text: I first visited the Tour over forty years ago when Claude Terrail was the owner. It was wonderful then. It is even better now under his son, Andre. Yes, it is expensive, but the experience is like nothing else, the restaurant, the unique view, possibly the best in Paris, and the sense of occasion. The food is better than ever. The starters were as good as anything in Paris, London, or New York, light, imaginative and full of flavour. We had the famous duck for our main course. It's wonderful but, dare I say it, less exciting than the other dishes. Next time I go I shall have something else, something which gives rein to the potential of a chef at the top of his game. Lastly, so many places like this are stuffy and formal. The Tour is the opposite. Nowhere has more charming staff.

original_text: Perfect sequence of dishes. From the minute you're greeted at the door until you step a foot outside the service is impeccable. Really great food and the wine list is to die for. If you can't find the wine you're looking for here, then it does not exist. Great view of Notre Dam from the dining room. We were lucky to be allowed on the cellar and it was an unbelievable experience. The history, service and amazing food make this restaurant a "bucket list" item.

original_text: Well, I'm not going back to *this* place. I'm not going to get the best meal of my life again, and I'm not going to do it on another beautiful evening. I'm certainly not going to have impeccable service, with everything in perfect place. There definitely won't be the chance to let the chef choose the meal again, allowing each dish to work in harmony with its predecessor. I'm not going to have the opportunity to let an expert sommelier recommend the perfect wines from a cellar of half a million bottles, and then find that those two carefully chosen bottles are excellent accompaniments for every course. I definitely won't get fantastic dishes at every turn that tease my palate with contrasting sights, textures, flavors, and aromas.
text: Well, I'm not going back to *this* place. I'm not going to get the best meal of my life again, and I'm not going to do it on another beautiful evening. There definitely won't be the chance to let the chef choose the meal again, allowing each dish to work in harmony with its predecessor. I'm not going to have the opportunity to let an expert sommelier recommend the perfect wines from a cellar of half a million bottles, and then find that those two carefully chosen bottles are excellent accompaniments for every course. I definitely won't get fantastic dishes at every turn that tease my palate with contrasting sights, textures, flavors, and aromas.

original_text: Always Delicious and Wonderful, is a must to eat here, it was the favorite restaurant of my grandparents and since the day I eat with them here has become my favorite reataurante as well. original_text: Terrible experience at the Rotisserie today 22/05 , I was so very much looking forward to finishing my trip in this restaurant which used to be fantastic and ended up having a terrible experience yet super expensive for what it was. original_text: I've long been a "fan" of La Rotisserie. The restaurant has long catered to an American clientale. It happens the I'm American. I spend alot of time in France. About 7 years ago someone recommended., La Rotisserie to us. We were thrilled-amazing rotisserie Lamb or Duck, carved in sections at our table . Roasted potatoes as well. Always delicious, without fail. Tonight, I arrived at the restaurant-it was a Monday night, and it was crowded;. But that's how this place rolls. I perused the menu, which seemed very different . They no longer offered the rotisserie lamb/duck for which they were "famous". The menu was abbreviated, with overpriced fare advertised. And no more rotisserie lamb or duck. Instead, I could have a "lamb stew". Though it didn't appeal to me at all, I ordered it. After a middling green salad starter (not on the menu, but the waiter "graciously" offered to order it for me"), out came the 'stew". Ugh. Chunks of grilled, hard, grisly lamb, a few carrots. I could barely chew through the disgusting "lamb" chunks. The "sauce" was gross. I was beyond appalled. I can't believe that this restaruant=which until last year was delicious-hard sunk t this level. Never again Hoards of "Amurricans" might think it's "authentic" and great. But they like The Olive Garden, too.

original_text: The food here is excellent. Classic French cuisine and love the open plan kitchen. The steaks are juicy and flavourful and the rotisserie chickens are simply delicious! Great wine selection including some Tour D'argent wines but the high point is the friendly service. Made to feel very welcome in this restaurant

original_text: Valentine's menu was preprepared and mediocre. No actual cooking involved, just heating things up. Aggressively tries to sell their own overpriced Champagne. Two glasses of a young Sauterne cost 20,- each, no warning given. Maybe it's better during a normal weekday, but for the money we ended up spending there are plenty of nicer places than this in Paris. All in all, militantly commercial with little to back it up

original_text: Horrible. We went there to celebrate my wife becoming a partner in her law firm. They tried to scam us for viciously expensive wine we'd neither ordered nor drunk. Trying to get it off the bill was a nightmare. The manager "wasn't available", they tried keeping me waiting round in the hope that I'd give up and pay. I was repeatedly asked if I wanted to keep waiting for the manager who "wasn't available". The waiters tried to stare me out. Eventually the manager gave up being "not available" and accepted they'd tried to rip us off. No, of course he didn't apologise, his attitude was that this was standard and I should have put up with the rip off. I wasn't all that impressed by the food either. Avoid. The evening was ruined

original_text: I love this restaurant. Have been coming for years-- it is always THE BEST! Escargot is the best in all of Paris....

original_text: La Tour d'Argant is a historic insitution. It keeps a retro atmosphere and that is why we love it and have no other comments than "thank you". Service-wise, impecable: waiters and waitresses are kind, caring, knowledgeable, discrete and agile as ballet-dancers. The menu is a classic and made of classics of French cuisine: if you come here, that is what you would expect to find and will find without disappointment. Unfortunately, some sour notes: 1. two glasses of champagne were ordered (Veuve Cliquot) and were delivered from a pre-opened bottle (at least a cuple of days before). Despite of what the sommelier tried to explain, this is a fact: perlage was absent/not existing and any bouquet/tast had faded away. this is unecceptable. Of ocurse, the two glasses were not charged on our bill.. but still this should never happen; 2. a big fishbone was in my sole. This could happen, but it CANNOT happen in place like la tour d'argent.

original_text: Beautiful and romantic setting with lots of history. The duck tasting menu is the obvious choice here. It’s pressed between golden blocks... doesn’t get more luxurious than this. You’ll be wowed by the wine selection and sommelier given there are over 500 pages of wine to choose from. We were saddened we weren’t able to go to the salon downstairs without a reservation.

You’ll be wowed by the wine selection and sommelier given there are over 500 pages of wine to choose from. We were saddened we weren’t able to go to the salon downstairs without a reservation.

original_text: As an avid wine lovee, I simply can't love this historical restaurant more. Reading the wine list, which consists of every bottle of French wine you could think of, is an absolute pleasure. In terms of food, I found everything generally delicate, delicious but not as surprising as other starred restaurants, but I'd not blame it for this. Generally speaking, I think this place is a must-go, not just for the food, but for the richness of history and wine.

original_text: Very nice place, well located but the "pressed duck" which is why the restaurant is famous for: is not on the menu, you need to preorder it so be careful. They do have best quality ingredients, but the prices for the wines (common and commercial wine brands) is really excessive. All food I tasted was nothing special really, but it is worth going there at least once in your life. Price per person €150 to €400.

original_text: The food was excellent, the staff very friendly and the location very central. The only thing we found bad is that the tables are extremely close together, basically it looks like you are eating with the tables next to you.

original_text: I have been here multiple times and yet never reviewed it. Let's correct this travesty now! This is an excellent restaurant! What else does one need to know? The service is impeccable! They great you downstairs and make you comfortable (with champagne of course!) The the service when you go upstairs gets no reproach from me. My wife was very happy with the attention, their quickness to answer your requests and their knowledge of what you might want to eat that night. Though my father and I have always chosen to eat the "Caneton Presse." The menu is mostly incredible dishes! My mother and wife has always gone with the a la carte. But my father and I share their signature dish. If you go there, you must have two people eat that dish. And you also have a card with the number of your caneton printed on it. I still have mine stashed in my desk right now. The wine list is a wine lovers' dream! Splurge a bit and enhance your night further! Their sommelier has always advised me to the greatest wine to pair with the various dishes! The view from the restaurant is incredible. And it is very much fun to watch the bateau-mouche pass by on the Seine! The only drawback: as you can guess, it's the price. A good evening for two people can go up to 2000 euros. But that is just me. Just tell your server and he/she will recommend what would fit you best. Especially when it involves wine! Recommended!!!

original_text: If you only have time for one meal in Paris, eat it here and get the whole duck. It's the best duck you will ever have. You can choose how it's cooked and they can even do half an half. They recommend medium rare but my SO wanted medium. So they roasted it one side medium rare for me and one side medium for my SO. Super friendly service.

original_text: Hurrendous welcome… would not accept our NHS covid certificates when it states clearly on the french government website that this is satisfactory. It clearly says certificate or QR! This same certificate was accepted from us by passport control, the Bristol Hotel where we were residing & every other restaurant we dined in during this trip, including Lasserre & 114 at the Bristol, so to say they were invalid is nonsense. I don’t think we would’ve got through border control otherwise!! We were really looking forward to this lunch & couldn’t be any more disappointed. Anyone coming from abroad, stay clear! Seems they make their own rules here, certainly different from everywhere else in Paris! We have been in the past, but certainly will never be back!

original_text: It is undoubtedly a very good restaurant, but falls short in a few ways. While the presentation and quality of ingredients are up to standard, the way by which the business is conducted leaves some to be desired. Dress codes are not adhered to, and some of the dishes are contrived and a case of heaping expensive ingredients and charging for it.

original_text: Amazing experience. Beautiful terrace and splendid food.

original_text: La Tour D'Argent far exceeded my expectations of a beautiful lunch service in Paris over the River Seine with great views of Notre Dame de Paris. The staff is expertly attentive, and the food was exquisitely crafted! For those reviewers who would highlight the 'loss' of 2 of its Michelin stars - I would state that I personally experienced no lapse of service or quality of food whatsoever - it truly felt as good as they come. At times in Paris, restaurants can have the view, but lack the execution - not at La Tour D'Argent! The execution is flawless. The wine list, which is deep enough for the greatest of connoisseurs, is also approachable. Sure - there are gems in the wine list reaching into the most exclusive of pricing realms, but there are also accessible options for the special occasion splurge for those that generally would not eat at such a high-end restaurant. My wife and I, on a 7-year anniversary trip - enjoyed reaching a little bit deeper to experience La Tour D'Argent and were not disappointed. It will easily be remembered as the best meal, I've ever had in my life, affected only minimally by the epic location, and the gorgeous environment. (Dress code detailed note: I thought it prudent to make a note, because I know many reading these reviews are seeking it - La Tour D'Argent should be noted that for dinner service, formal attire makes the most sense - Coat + Tie for men, equivalent dressy attire for women). Lunch service may have slightly more exception, but remember - they are putting out the best in red-carpet treatment and service - return the gesture. Myself, I wore a blue suit coat, full button down white dress shirt, dress shoes, and extremely dark denim - I attempted modern-chic informal business - and I did not feel out of place. Had I lacked the coat, I feel I would have felt out of place. Even at lunch, men should have coats at La Tour D'Argent - blazer or otherwise. My wife wore a chic sweater, and a darker denim pair of pants, paired with a perfect pair of heels. (Most other women of the restaurant had on smart dresses, sweaters, or blazers that also suited the restaurant well). I will not tell you that La Tour D'Argent will toss you over your outfit (outside of extremes such as torn denim, sneakers, athletic clothing, etc), but I can tell you, my description for our attire above had us comfortable at lunch, and I would guess it hits a minimum expectation. Dress up! It can be fun! Pack suits that travel well - wear your coat on the plane, fold it gently for transit - you can do it - and have a great time. Ok, I'll wrap this up. Suffice it to say - wonderful! expert! Tres Magnifque!

original_text: My husband and I had dinner here last night. We both had food poisoning this morning, throwing up in our hotel toilet. Food hygiene is most important thing for tourists. So in this case I wish I could give you 0/5.
response_from_owner: Dear Mrs Zhang, we are deeply sorry to read your message and that you get sicked this morning. We perfectly remember you and we are very surprised as you ordered two differents starters (foie gras and king prawns) and two different dishes (crossed duck and roasted chicken). After having discussed with our Chef this morning, we can ensure you that our products are totally fresh and cooked with all the elementary rules of hygiene. Beside, we sold a lot of these products yesterday evening without any problem. We hope you will feel better soon and we will be happy to welcome you in the future.
text: My husband and I had dinner here last night. We both had food poisoning this morning, throwing up in our hotel toilet. Food hygiene is most important thing for tourists. So in this case I wish I could give you 0/5.

original_text: Pros: - Well priced - Cosy vibe - Takes online reservations - Good view of the river if you sit in the conservatory - Menu had ALL the French classics - bread from the boulangerie next door is incredible, as is the butter Cons: - Roast chicken (€21 - their signature dish) was a little dry - The service SERVICE Seated at 12:30, drinks order taken at 13h, another 15 mins before our drink arrived. Unable to half half salad, half fries as a side. Other tables served way quicker and more attentively than us, despite our area being half full. As for dessert, our waiter put the menus on our table and held a tray of patisseries in front of us and DIDNT SPEAK ONE WORD. I obviously understood what he was doing but I had expected him to explain that we could choose from the platter and perhaps even explain what was on offer. So shocked. The bill took so long to come that we eventually got up and paid ourselves. It’s a shame because it has the makings of a great casual haunt with decently priced and delicious French bistrot classics, but I can’t stand the level of service. Even for France.

Unable to half half salad, half fries as a side. Other tables served way quicker and more attentively than us, despite our area being half full. As for dessert, our waiter put the menus on our table and held a tray of patisseries in front of us and DIDNT SPEAK ONE WORD. I obviously understood what he was doing but I had expected him to explain that we could choose from the platter and perhaps even explain what was on offer. So shocked. The bill took so long to come that we eventually got up and paid ourselves. It’s a shame because it has the makings of a great casual haunt with decently priced and delicious French bistrot classics, but I can’t stand the level of service. Even for France.

original_text: Le Tour D'Argent at one time had three Michelin Stars. It now has one. If one takes into account the recent transformation of La Rotisserie D'Argent, it may be in the negative soon. Le Rotisserie Beaujolais was the name of this restaurant the family owned until Andre Delair went Disney recently. Note the tourist who give high marks. Note the lack of Parisienne reviews and judge for yourself. As an American who lives in Paris an was a steady customer who referred many to this establishement, I recently went to the new transformation of this restaurant and was horrified. While the meat was done well, better now realize you have to order for two-you could get for one before Ms. Delair sold out to tourists or profit. BTW, note all of the wine labeled by D'Argent, they even now make their own cheap sparking water (more profit naturally). You want good pomme frites, go to McDonalds, it is honestly better there. You want a great French dining experience, go to Le Reminet just down the street. Felicitations Ms. Delair for destroying a very nice restaurant, mais I am sure it will be very profitable.

original_text: Il ristorante più conosciuto di Parigi, un'istituzione della città fin dagli anni '30. Ambiente impeccabile, vista magnifica, cucina eccellente. La stella Michelin di cui gode, non è in grado di aggiungere nulla ad un posto del genere. È uno dei pochissimi ristoranti che si può ritenere al di sopra del giudizio della Guida Michelin.. non si può valutare la storia. La Tour d'Argent È Parigi. Quella eterna. Cantina infinita, con vini esclusivamente francesi (ad eccezione di svariati tipi di Porto) di grande livello, a prezzi non proprio convenienti (ma l'ambiente ha un suo prezzo e, inoltre, il ricarico eccessivo sui vini è pratica comune dei grandi ristoranti di Parigi). Un'esperienza che andrebbe fatta almeno una volta nella vita, potendosi permettere i prezzi (a partire da 350/400 € a persona).
text: The best-known restaurant in Paris, a city institution since the 1930s. Impeccable setting, magnificent view, excellent cuisine. The Michelin star it enjoys is unable to add anything to a place like this. It is one of the very few restaurants that can be considered above the judgment of the Michelin Guide... you cannot evaluate history. The Tour d'Argent IS Paris. The eternal one. Infinite cellar, with exclusively French wines (with the exception of various types of Port) of a high standard, at prices that are not exactly convenient (but the environment has its price and, furthermore, excessive mark-ups on wines are common practice in large restaurants in Paris). An experience that should be done at least once in a lifetime, if you can afford the prices (starting from €350/400 per person).

original_text: Excelente comida, la mejor que hemos tenido en Paris. El pato está espectacular! El ambiente familiar y alegre nos fascinó. Los meseros son los más simpáticos y buena onda. El servicio de primera! Sin duda regresaremos en nuestros próximos viajes a Paris y le recomendaremos este lugar a todos nuestros amigos y familiares y amigos. Vale muchísimo la pena!
text: Excellent food, the best we have had in Paris. The duck is spectacular! The family and happy atmosphere fascinated us. The waiters are the friendliest and coolest. First class service! We will definitely return on our next trips to Paris and will recommend this place to all our friends and family. It is very worth it!

original_text: Ayant toujours été attiré par le look "table champêtre" de ce lieu, je m'y suis arrêté aujourd'hui ! Grand bien m'en a pris. Installé sur la terrasse qui surplombe la Seine avec Notre Dame en panorama, l'ambiance (même bruyante) était délicieuse. Les plats servis non moins succulents. Un onglet juste fondant, en parfaite cuisson. Le service gagnerait à être plus engageant pour aller avec l'ambiance sympathique de cette terrasse. Si les prix à la carte restent sur la moyenne haute, la carte des vins semble vouloir flirter avec celle de sa grande soeur la Tour. J'ai eu un peu de mal à choisir une bouteille à prix correct. Finalement un Morgon à 46€ à fait l'affaire (34 ou 36 ailleurs) J'y retournerai pour le plaisir du moment et du lieu surtout.
text: Having always been attracted by the “country table” look of this place, I stopped there today! Great good has come to me. Installed on the terrace overlooking the Seine with Notre Dame in the panorama, the atmosphere (even noisy) was delicious. The dishes served are no less succulent. A just melting tab, perfectly cooked. The service would benefit from being more engaging to go with the friendly atmosphere of this terrace. If the prices on the menu remain on the high average, the wine list seems to want to flirt with that of its big sister the Tour. I had a little trouble choosing a bottle at the right price. Finally a Morgon at 46€ did the trick (34 or 36 elsewhere) I will return there for the pleasure of the moment and the place above all.

original_text: Institution parisienne, qui brille par son emplacement offrant des vues époustouflantes sur Paris. Accueil professionnel et sérieux qui manque néanmoins de sourire. Décoration classique, toutes les tables sont bien disposées pour bénéficier du panorama. Service brouillon (trop de serveurs), sommelier passionné qui nous emporte avec simplicité et pédagogie, dans les méandres de la carte gigantesque et nous la rend accessible. Manque d'attention au client : même pas 1 bougie pour l'anniversaire de notre fille (indiqué sur la réservation et précisé en début de repas). Plats raffinés, mais pas d'effet "waouh" Le menu du déjeuner offre un excellent rapport qualité /prix
text: Parisian institution, which shines for its location offering breathtaking views of Paris. Professional and serious welcome which nevertheless lacks a smile. Classic decoration, all tables are well arranged to benefit from the panorama. Messy service (too many servers), passionate sommelier who takes us with simplicity and education into the twists and turns of the gigantic menu and makes it accessible to us. Lack of attention to the customer: not even 1 candle for our daughter's birthday (indicated on the reservation and specified at the start of the meal). Refined dishes, but no “wow” effect The lunch menu offers excellent value for money

original_text: Blindé d'américains mais à la hauteur de sa réputation. J'ai adoré ce repas. Si vous prenez le canard partez sur un vin du Rhône.
text: Armored with Americans but living up to its reputation. I loved this meal. If you take the duck, go for a Rhône wine.

original_text: Mon restaurant préféré pour manger du canard à Paris. Le canard rôti en deux services est une signature incontournable de cet établissement. Hocine, Anton et Oualid, les serveurs, sont très professionnels et chaleureux. On nous a gracieusement offert un délicieux cocktail de la maison et je recommande vivement leur mousse au chocolat pour terminer le repas en beauté.
text: My favorite restaurant to eat duck in Paris. The two-course roast duck is an essential signature of this establishment. Hocine, Anton and Oualid, the servers, are very professional and warm. We were graciously offered a delicious house cocktail and I highly recommend their chocolate mousse to end the meal in style.

original_text: Tant le lieu - avec sa vue exceptionnelle sur la Seine et Notre-Dame - que la cuisine, raffinée et bien dosée, ou encore le service, attentionné et élégant, font de ce repas gastronomique une expérience savoureuse et inoubliable.
text: Both the location - with its exceptional view of the Seine and Notre-Dame - as well as the refined and well-balanced cuisine, as well as the attentive and elegant service, make this gastronomic meal a tasty and unforgettable experience.

original_text: Merveilleux moment! Le service était impeccable, tout le personnel était aux petits soins, l’expérience a été incroyable! Je veux y retourner et m’asseoir plus près de la cuisine ouverte pour pouvoir observer le ballet merveilleux des cuisiniers en toque! Le repas était délicieux et TRÈS copieux! (Menu au fil des saisons) Merci pour ce joli moment et bravo à toute l’équipe!
text: Wonderful time! The service was impeccable, all the staff were attentive, the experience was incredible! I want to go back and sit closer to the open kitchen so I can watch the marvelous ballet of the chefs in chef hats! The meal was delicious and VERY filling! (Menu throughout the seasons) Thank you for this lovely moment and congratulations to the whole team!

original_text: En ces temps post Covid où la Ressource humaine est rare, garder une équipe de réception, de salle et aux fourneaux aussi sympathique et professionnelle relève du grand Art. Bravo aux Chefs d’orchestre. Beaucoup de joie d’avoir partagé notre anniversaire dans ce lieu historique.
text: In these post-Covid times where human resources are scarce, keeping such a friendly and professional reception, dining room and kitchen team is a great art. Well done to the conductors. Lots of joy to have shared our anniversary in this historic place.

original_text: Voulant se restaurer à proximité de notre point de chute, nous avons suivi les avis des nombreuses personnes qui ont déjeuné à cette table. Ce fut une très agréable expérience, une table côte à côte avec vue sur seine pour le moins originale. Nous avons pris la côte de bœuf pour deux personnes et nous nous sommes régalés. Bien que les prix affichés puissent en refroidir certains, ils sont à la hauteur du cadre et du service, et semble t-il, juste, par rapport à la qualité du plat et du vin.
text: Wanting to eat near our base, we followed the advice of the many people who had lunch at this table. It was a very pleasant experience, a table side by side with a view of the Seine, to say the least original. We had the prime rib for two people and we enjoyed it. Although the prices displayed may put some off, they are commensurate with the setting and the service, and it seems fair in relation to the quality of the dish and the wine.

original_text: Wir haben schon viel darüber gehört und gelesen. Das Erlebnis übertrifft das. Die Qualität des Essens ist nicht zu übertreffen. Alles perfekt und auf den Punkt zubereitet. Ein Genuss. Geht nicht besser. Die Weinbegleitung Top, was bei der Auswahl an edlen Tropfen nicht überrascht. Die lassen es sich auch was kosten, was man wissen sollte, wenn man hin geht. Service sehr professionell und freundlich. Das Aufeinanderfolgen der Gänge war uns etwas zu schnell. Wir hätten jeden Gang noch mehr zelebriert. Wir kommen wieder beim nächsten Paris Besuch.
text: We have heard and read a lot about it. The experience surpasses that. The quality of the food cannot be beat. Everything prepared perfectly and to the point. A pleasure. Doesn't get any better. The wine accompaniment is top, which is not surprising given the selection of fine wines. They also charge something, which you should know if you go. Service very professional and friendly. The succession of the courses was a bit too fast for us. We would have celebrated every course even more. We will come back next time we visit Paris.

original_text: Expérience unique , cadre magnifique, cuisine très raffinée et service impeccable! Soirée magique inoubliable.
text: Unique experience, magnificent setting, very refined cuisine and impeccable service! Unforgettable magical evening.

original_text: Table réservée pour un anniversaire de mariage. Le personnel était très attentif, nos demandes ont toutes été acceptées et le service a été impeccable. La vue est superbe et les plats sont de qualité, ce n’est pas forcement le produit qui est dans votre assiette qui est remarquable mais la manière dont il est sublimé. Jusqu’au pain qui se marie parfaitement avec votre plat, en passant par l’assiette, les couverts ou les verres. Nous n’avons pas pu tester la carte (bible) des vins car nous conduisions mais le champagne rosé était excellent.👌 À faire absolument lorsque vous faites un passage à Paris, ce restaurant est au niveau de sa réputation.
text: Table reserved for a wedding anniversary. The staff was very attentive, our requests were all accepted and the service was impeccable. The view is superb and the dishes are of quality, it is not necessarily the product on your plate that is remarkable but the way in which it is sublimated. Right down to the bread that goes perfectly with your dish, including the plate, cutlery or glasses. We weren't able to try the wine list because we were driving but the rosé champagne was excellent.👌 A must do when you're in Paris, this restaurant lives up to its reputation.

original_text: Tout était délicieux, la nourriture, les vins, un service parfait. Une soirée parfaite.
text: Everything was delicious, the food, the wines, perfect service. A perfect evening.

original_text: К сожалению, ресторан превращается в аттракцион для туристов. Сервис сомнительный. Молодой персонал. Винная карта, которая ранее привлекала гостей , стала очень заряженная, подорожав в ~2,5 раза Все равно впечатления остались
text: Unfortunately, the restaurant is turning into a tourist attraction. The service is questionable. Young staff. The wine list, which previously attracted guests, has become very charged, having risen in price by ~2.5 times Still the impressions remain

original_text: Le service est toujours très bon mais pour la nourriture, c'est extrêmement décevant. Un mini morceau de foie gras pour 34€, une piece de steak avec énormément de gras dans une sauce ultra pimentée et le confit de canard un peu sec sans surprise. Assis à l'arrière du restaurant ou on peu voir des dizaines de petites mouches noires au plafond et sur les murs. En quittant, on a vu des souris dans la boulangerie de la tour. Un problème récurrent qu'ils n'ont toujours pas réglé... bref, avec une multitude d'excellents restaurants dans la ville, évitez celui-ci.
text: The service is always very good but for the food, it is extremely disappointing. A mini piece of foie gras for €34, a piece of steak with a lot of fat in an ultra spicy sauce and the duck confit, unsurprisingly a little dry. Sitting at the back of the restaurant where you can see dozens of small black flies on the ceiling and on the walls. As we were leaving, we saw mice in the tower bakery. A recurring problem that they still haven't fixed... in short, with a multitude of excellent restaurants in the city, avoid this one.

original_text: --- La Rotisserie D'Argent à Paris offre une expérience culinaire exceptionnelle, oscillant entre semi-gastronomique et gastronomique. Les plats, délicieux et élégamment présentés, reflètent la richesse de la cuisine française. L'atmosphère est charmante et sophistiquée, idéale pour une soirée mémorable. Un point fort indéniable est le service impeccable, dirigé par le super directeur Jérémy. Sa passion et son professionnalisme garantissent une expérience client hors pair. En somme, une adresse incontournable pour les amateurs de fine cuisine à Paris.
text: ---  La Rotisserie D'Argent in Paris offers an exceptional culinary experience, oscillating between semi-gastronomic and gourmet. The dishes, delicious and elegantly presented, reflect the richness of French cuisine. The atmosphere is charming and sophisticated, ideal for a memorable evening. An undeniable strong point is the impeccable service, led by the super manager Jérémy. His passion and professionalism guarantee an unparalleled customer experience. In short, an essential address for lovers of fine cuisine in Paris.

original_text: Très bonne expérience pour fêter nos 20 ans de mariage. Service parfait et très bons conseils sur l'alliance mets vins. La vue est splendide et nous avons pu allez visiter la terrasse qui est parfaite également.
text: Very good experience to celebrate our 20th wedding anniversary. Perfect service and very good advice on pairing food and wine. The view is splendid and we were able to visit the terrace which is also perfect.

original_text: Quelle déception ! Une joie de retrouver mes amis à La Rôtisserie d’Argent que nous apprécions tant. 5 personnes le 8 mai au soir. Nous commandons des pastis pour l’apéritif et on nous sert un équivalent anisé sans nous prévenir. Nous passons commande des plats, il y a une très jeune fille de 3 ans à table avec nous et l’un de mes enfants qui doit partir rapidement. Nous demandons leurs plats en direct, il seront servis en dernier au bout de 40 minutes. Nous commandons une tarte au citron en dessert pour la petite qui mange la moitié et nous nous rendons compte qu’elle a une odeur très forte. La crème à tourné, la tarte est avariée. Nous avions expressément demandé de répartir avec la carcasse du canard que nous avions mangé, la carcasse a été jetée. Ça fait beaucoup de fausses notes! Beaucoup trop! Pas acceptable. Je venais régulièrement depuis 10 ans, c’était la dernière ! Vous n’êtes plus à la hauteur
text: What a desappointment ! A joy to meet my friends at La Rôtisserie d’Argent that we appreciate so much. 5 people on the evening of May 8. We order pastis for the aperitif and we are served an aniseed equivalent without warning us. We order dishes, there is a very young girl of 3 years old at the table with us and one of my children who has to leave quickly. We ask for their dishes directly, they will be served last after 40 minutes. We order a lemon tart for dessert for the little one who eats half and we realize that it has a very strong smell. The cream has gone bad, the pie is spoiled. We had expressly asked to share with the carcass of the duck that we had eaten, the carcass was thrown away. That’s a lot of false notes! Too much! Not acceptable. I had been coming regularly for 10 years, this was the last! You are no longer good enough

original_text: Quelle déception ! Volaille réchauffée qui ne sort pas de la rôtisserie mais qui a été cuite la veille. Une viande un peu sèche et vaguement tiède. La peau blanchâtre et molle. Un jus de viande lourd et insignifiant. Je déconseille vraiment. D’ailleurs la salle était vide.
text: What a desappointment ! Reheated poultry that has not come out of the rotisserie but has been cooked the day before. A slightly dry and vaguely lukewarm meat. The skin is whitish and soft. A heavy and insignificant gravy. I really advise against it. Besides, the room was empty.

original_text: Merci pour la qualité de votre ensemble vous êtes digne de défendre la vrai Gastronomie française !
text: Thank you for the quality of your ensemble, you are worthy of defending true French Gastronomy!

original_text: Cadre très très agréable : déjeuner sur le pont face au restaurant, une vraie carte postale en 3D ! Service de bonne volonté, souriant, mais un peu familier et brouillon. Cuisine correcte de brasserie, sans surprise mais de bon aloi. Très bonne tarte chocolat. Prix en rapport avec la situation.
text: Very very pleasant setting: lunch on the bridge facing the restaurant, a real 3D postcard! Good service, smiling, but a little familiar and messy. Correct brasserie cuisine, no surprises but of good quality. Very good chocolate tart. Price in relation to the situation.

original_text: 這次訂了戶外的座位，風景跟氛圍絕佳，餐點上鴨腿令人驚豔，其他主餐沒有太多驚喜，侍酒師很專業，服務也很棒，整體來說值得一訪。
text: I booked an outdoor seat this time. The scenery and atmosphere are great. The duck legs are amazing. There are not many surprises in other main meals. The sommelier is very professional and the service is great. Overall, it is worth a visit.

original_text: Byłam w Rotisserie d'Argent, nie w La Tour d'Argent. Wrażenia bardzo pozytywne. Miła restauracyjka w pobliżu Sekwany. Jeszcze nigdy w życiu nie obsługiwało mnie w restauracji tak wielu ludzi. Chyba za każdą czynność jest tu odpowiedzialny kto inny. Ale to nie przytłaczało, odbywało się bardzo dyskretnie. Tradycyjne potrawy kuchni francuskiej, ale nie takie jak z tą kuchnią kojarzą się nam, Polakom. Z przystawek polecam Foie Gras, przepyszne. Ale uwaga na coś, co nam polecono jako specjalność zakładu. Były to jajka z majonezem, podane na pokrojonych w kostkę ziemniakach. Majonez oczywiście boski, ale z racji powszechności tych składników w polskiej kuchni można poczuć lekki zawód 😉 Dania główne bardzo smaczne. Pierwszy raz jadłam nerki cielęce. Sos do nich był po prostu genialny. Poza tym kaczka i wieprzowina (tłuste mięso, chyba boczek?, ale bardzo smaczne). Wyszliśmy zadowoleni.
text: I was at Rotisserie d'Argent, not La Tour d'Argent. Very positive impressions. Nice restaurant near the Seine. I have never been served by so many people in a restaurant in my life. I guess someone else is responsible for every activity here. But it wasn't overwhelming, it was done very discreetly. Traditional French dishes, but not the ones we, Poles, associate with this cuisine. As for appetizers, I recommend Foie Gras, delicious. But watch out for something that was recommended to us as the house's specialty. They were eggs with mayonnaise, served on diced potatoes. The mayonnaise is, of course, divine, but due to the commonness of these ingredients in Polish cuisine, you may feel a bit disappointed 😉 The main courses are very tasty. I ate veal kidneys for the first time. The sauce for them was simply brilliant. Also duck and pork (fatty meat, probably bacon?, but very tasty). We left satisfied.

original_text: Un lieu magnifique chargé d'histoire. L'équipe est à chaque moment au petit soins. Une prévenance sans faille. Nous avons pris un menu type surprise. Nous ne savions donc pas ce que nous allions mangé. Ce n'est pas dérangeant et nous avons découvert une multitude de plat délicieux. Quenelle de sandre, sole, canard, artichaut et œufs surprise. Vraiment tout est très bon, les sauces sont justes et très goutues. Un seul bémol ? Peut-être les recettes qui restent tout de même classique et qui empêchent de rendre plus léger certains plats. En sortant de la...on sent qu'on a mangé ! C'était un rêve d'y aller, je n'ai pas été déçue et j'y reviendrais pour une occasion.
text: A magnificent place full of history. The team takes great care of you at all times. Unfailing thoughtfulness. We had a surprise menu. So we didn't know what we were going to eat. It's not disturbing and we discovered a multitude of delicious dishes. Quenelle of zander, sole, duck, artichoke and surprise eggs. Really everything is very good, the sauces are just right and very tasty. Just one downside? Perhaps the recipes which still remain classic and which prevent us from making certain dishes lighter. When you leave...you feel like you've eaten! It was a dream to go there, I was not disappointed and I would come back for an occasion.

original_text: Un moment unique : une table unique et un service de très grande qualité. Le déjeuner était excellent
text: A unique moment: a unique table and very high quality service. Lunch was excellent

original_text: Malheureusement nous avons passé un moment désagréable à cause d'un rat se promenant juste en dessous de la table. Les serveurs disent que c'est normal à cause de la seine, je suis désolée mais ce n'est pas acceptable ces propos. Le service était très bien, le repas j'ai moyennement apprécié car le canard était trop cuit. En tout cas je ne reviendrai plus jamais.
text: Unfortunately we had an unpleasant time because of a rat walking just under the table. The waiters say that it's normal because of the Seine, I'm sorry but this is not acceptable. The service was very good, the meal I enjoyed moderately because the duck was overcooked. In any case I will never come back again.

original_text: Ein unglaubliches Erlebnis, von der Lage über dem Service, die Weinkarte und dem Essen. Für mich 100%.
text: An incredible experience, from the location to the service, the wine list and the food. For me 100%.

original_text: Très bon repas. Le canard entier est excellent, même si l'attente est longue (1 heure). Personnel professionnel et sympathique.
text: Very good meal. The whole duck is excellent, even if the wait is long (1 hour). Professional and friendly staff.

original_text: Excellent déjeuner en terrasse avec une vue splendide sur Notre Dame! La qualité des mets était vraiment au rdv, mention spéciale pour la tarte au citron. Par ailleurs l'accueil du directeur, Jérémie, et de ses serveurs est très chaleureuse. J'y retournerai avec grand plaisir !!
text: Excellent lunch on the terrace with a splendid view of Notre Dame! The quality of the food was really there, special mention for the lemon tart. Furthermore, the welcome from the director, Jérémie, and his servers is very warm. I will return with great pleasure!!

original_text: 超级棒🎉 整只鸭口感绝了！强烈推荐整只鸭 可以和朋友分享！下次还来
text: Super awesome🎉 The whole duck tastes amazing! Highly recommend the whole duck and share it with friends! Come again next time

original_text: Nous avons passé un excellent déjeuner, l'accueil parfait et le repas excellent. Nous garderons un souvenir mémorable du canard entier, le magret fondant dans la bouche et les sauces succulentes! Merci à toute la Rôtisserie !
text: We had an excellent lunch, the welcome was perfect and the meal was excellent. We will keep unforgettable memories of the whole duck, the melt-in-your-mouth breast and the succulent sauces! Thanks to the entire Rotisserie!

original_text: 很喜歡的法式餐廳 甜點烤布蕾超級好吃 巧克力慕斯也是 非常棒 主菜鴨子更是美味
text: My favorite French restaurant Dessert baked pudding is super delicious Chocolate mousse too Very good The main course duck is even more delicious

original_text: Vue inégalée, service superbe, cuisine parfaite ! Tous les ingrédients d'un excellent moment ont été réunis chez vous pour notre déjeuner du 13 juin . Avec nos remerciements... en attendant une prochaine fois !
text: Unparalleled view, superb service, perfect cuisine! All the ingredients for an excellent time were brought together at your home for our lunch on June 13. With thanks... until next time!

original_text: Présence de souris sous notre table le 27 juin 2024, qui a gâché notre soirée d'anniversaire et notre appétit. Serveur décevant : "on est a Paris c'est normal qu'il y a des souris"
text: Presence of mice under our table on June 27, 2024, which spoiled our birthday evening and our appetite. Disappointing waiter: "we're in Paris, it's normal that there are mice"

original_text: Une déception totale ! La nourriture était mauvaise, digne d’une cantine d’autoroute bon marché. Et ne parlons même pas des prix, qui étaient tout simplement scandaleux pour ce que nous avons reçu. Évitez ce piège à touristes à tout prix, à moins que vous ne vouliez ressortir avec un goût amer dans la bouche et un trou béant dans votre portefeuille. Une expérience à oublier au plus vite.
text: A total disappointment! The food was bad, worthy of a cheap motorway canteen. And let's not even talk about the prices, which were simply outrageous for what we received. Avoid this tourist trap at all costs, unless you want to come away with a bitter taste in your mouth and a gaping hole in your wallet. An experience to forget as quickly as possible.

original_text: Première point et c’est le plus important nous avons aimé la cuisine et découvert quelques nouvelles saveurs. De plus il est appréciable de voir une équipe nombreuse et échapper au flux tendu source d’insatisfaction. Seul bémol car il faut bien tout remonter : le repas nous a été offert par des amis et le fromage n’étant pas inclu cela ne nous a pas été précisé. 32€ le morceau de fromage c’est vrai qu’on se dit que la marge est belle. Toutefois notre satisfaction est complète.
text: First point and this is the most important, we liked the cuisine and discovered some new flavors. In addition, it is appreciable to see a large team and escape from the tense flow that is a source of dissatisfaction. The only downside is that you have to put everything back together: the meal was offered to us by friends and the cheese was not included, so this was not made clear to us. 32€ per piece of cheese, it’s true that we say that the margin is nice. However, our satisfaction is complete.

original_text: Lorsque l’on rentre dans ce restaurant parisien mythique, dont il se dit qu’il existe depuis 1582, on s’immerge dans un monde merveilleux! Le cadre historique, la magnifique vue, l’excellent service, le fameux canard au sang (et de nombreux autres délicieux mets)…autant d’éléments qui ont rendu notre soirée inoubliable!
text: When you enter this legendary Parisian restaurant, which is said to have existed since 1582, you immerse yourself in a wonderful world! The historic setting, the magnificent view, the excellent service, the famous duck au sang (and many other delicious dishes)…so many elements that made our evening unforgettable!

original_text: Un seul mot : PARFAIT ! Nous avons organisé un repas de famille pour notre mariage à la tour d’argent, le service client a tout organisé à la perfection, très présent. Arrivés sur place : un service irréprochable, beaucoup de gentillesse et de bienveillance sans aucune prétention pour un standing haut de gamme ! Les plats sont excellents, les boissons impeccables, la vue incroyable. Nous avons hâte de revenir !! Merci pour tout
text: One word: PERFECT! We organized a family meal for our wedding at the Silver Tower, the customer service organized everything to perfection, very present. Arrived on site: impeccable service, lots of kindness and goodwill without any pretension for a high-end standard! The dishes are excellent, the drinks impeccable, the view incredible. We can't wait to come back!! thank you for everything

original_text: Nous n'étions pas à la rôtisserie mais au restaurant de la Tour d'Argent. Le service est hors pair, le personnel très attentif, très réactif et d'une extrême courtoisie. Les plats s'enchaînent sans se faire attendre et servis avec beaucoup de délicatesse. La cuisine très raffinée, et innovante. Le cadre est somptueux.
text: We were not at the rotisserie but at the Tour d'Argent restaurant. The service is unparalleled, the staff very attentive, very responsive and extremely courteous. The dishes follow one another without delay and are served with great delicacy. The cuisine is very refined and innovative. The setting is sumptuous.

original_text: Es el hermano pequeño de la Tour D’Argent, el cual he visitado en 3 ocasiones, en 1988 cuando tenía 3 estrellas Michelin y 2 veces cuando solo tenia 1 estrella. La última hace exactamente 3 años. Pues bien, le pasa lo mismo que a su hermano mayor: hay una desproporción entre calidad y precio La calidad de sus productos es indiscutible. Pero se pasan Una minicopa de champagne, 15€, es desproporcionado. El Foie está riquísimo pero no vale 20€ el trozo que te ponen. La carne estaba deliciosa, con una salsa de pimienta sabrosisima, 39€. En fin, muy rico todo, pero un poco demasiado caro. El baño, único, muy limpio.
text: It is the little brother of the Tour D'Argent, which I have visited 3 times, in 1988 when it had 3 Michelin stars and 2 times when it only had 1 star. The last one exactly 3 years ago. Well, the same thing happens to him as his older brother: there is a disproportion between quality and price The quality of their products is indisputable. But they pass A mini glass of champagne, €15, is disproportionate. The Foie is delicious but it's not worth €20 for the piece they give you. The meat was delicious, with a delicious pepper sauce, €39. In short, everything is very delicious, but a little too expensive. The bathroom, unique, very clean.

original_text: Moment divin avec une vue imprenable sur Paris. Personnel incroyable, plats exquis avec un petit coup de cœur pour le dessert (en particulier la glace basilic et la crème citron, basilic). Petite visite du rooftop pour la vue 360 sur les monuments parisiens🤩 Tout était parfait, merci ☺️
text: Divine moment with a breathtaking view of Paris. Incredible staff, exquisite dishes with a little favorite for dessert (especially the basil ice cream and the lemon-basil cream). Little visit to the rooftop for the 360 ​​view of the Parisian monuments🤩 Everything was perfect, thank you ☺️

original_text: Ottima cena! Servizio impeccabile e qualità della materia prima molto alta. La miglior cena di Parigi!
text: Excellent dinner! Impeccable service and very high quality of raw materials. The best dinner in Paris!

original_text: Mets d'une grande finesse. Le personnel très à l'écoute et professionnel continuer c'est parfait. La vue panoramique sur Paris est dégagée et si vaste. Merci pour ce repas et ce moment si agréable dans votre restaurant.
text: A dish of great finesse. The staff, very attentive and professional, continue to be perfect. The panoramic view of Paris is unobstructed and so vast. Thank you for this meal and this pleasant moment in your restaurant.

original_text: 只要翻開旅遊書，絶對看過這家曾經是米其林二星的銀塔餐廳。 第一次到這家400多年歷史的銀塔餐廳時，看到牆壁上掛滿各國總統元首的照片和親筆簽名，真的有被震懾住，因此對這家餐廳充滿更多的期待。用餐完後，默默許下願望，如再到巴黎，一定要再來一次，因為一直對血鴨念念不忘。 可惜這一次忘記再跟餐廳確認訂血鴨，但一如既往的一流服務，每一道菜都像藝術品一樣，美的讓人驚艷，味道方面，好像第一次去的血鴨較好吃，有一二道菜色雖然很美，但味道不太懂欣賞。非常難忘的經驗，當然帳單價格也是很難忘（快1000歐元）如想坐到餐廳風景最棒的位置（巴黎聖母院全景）記得提前半年預約付訂金，另外訂血鴨要2天前再跟餐廳預約
text: As long as you open a travel book, you will definitely have seen this Silver Tower restaurant that once had two Michelin stars. When I first visited this 400-year-old Silver Tower restaurant, I was really shocked when I saw the photos and autographs of presidents and heads of state hanging on the walls, so I had more expectations for this restaurant. After finishing the meal, I silently made a wish that if I come back to Paris, I will definitely come here again because I have always missed the blood duck. It's a pity that I forgot to confirm the blood duck order with the restaurant this time, but the service is top-notch as always, and every dish is like a work of art. It's stunningly beautiful. In terms of taste, the blood duck seems to be better when I go there for the first time. One or two Although the color of the dish is beautiful, the taste is not something I appreciate. A very unforgettable experience, and of course the bill price is also very unforgettable (almost 1,000 euros). If you want to sit in the restaurant with the best view (panoramic view of Notre Dame de Paris), remember to make a reservation six months in advance and pay a deposit. In addition, if you order the blood duck, you must contact us 2 days in advance. Restaurant reservation

original_text: Restaurante una estrella Michelín en la Rive Gauche de Paris. La comida espectacular. Fabulosos los tradicionales escargots y el confit de pato. Un poco reducido de espacio. No le doy 5 estrellas porque el precio me parece excesivo.
text: Michelin star restaurant on the Rive Gauche in Paris. Spectacular food. The traditional escargots and duck confit are fabulous. A little tight on space. I don't give it 5 stars because the price seems excessive to me.

original_text: Conocí el restaurante antes de la remodelación y reconozco que quedó muy bien, incluso un poco más relajado, pero al ser admirador del clásico estilo francés, extrañé mucho el ambiente anterior. Independientemente de eso, la comida sigue siendo extraordinaria, la atención es espectacular y las vistas que ofrece el restaurante, independiente del lugar en que se ubique la mesa, vale cada euro.
text: I visited the restaurant before the remodeling and I admit that it turned out very well, even a little more relaxed, but being a fan of the classic French style, I really missed the previous atmosphere. Regardless of that, the food is still extraordinary, the service is spectacular and the views offered by the restaurant, regardless of where the table is located, are worth every euro.

original_text: Cette soirée d'anniversaire du dimanche 12 mai avait pourtant bien mal débuté pour des raisons (relativement) indépendantes de la volonté du restaurant : La météo capricieuse de ce pont du mois de mai avait ainsi d'abord été très ensoleillée puis pluvieuse, entrainant respectivement un afflux inattendu de clients (générant une pénurie de produits qui n'étaient plus disponibles à la carte ce soir-là) puis la fermeture de la terrasse (dont la magnifique vue était l'une des principales raisons de notre venue). Bref, le personnel comprend la situation et notre frustration et est donc aux petits soins pour nous faire oublier ces désagréments et pour que l'on passe une bonne soirée (6 coupes de champagne, 1 entrée à partager et 1 dessert offert, ce n'est tout de même pas rien). Au final, les plats sont délicieux (le canard reste une référence, le saumon n'est pas en reste). Et pourtant, au moment du départ, l'expérience la plus inoubliable restera sans aucun doute la proposition de prendre un dernier verre sur le tout nouveau toit-terrasse du restaurant la Tour d'argent (situé juste à coté), profitant ainsi d'une vue encore plus impressionnante et magique sur Paris qu'escomptée initialement. Une mention très spéciale à Wallid et à toute son équipe pour leur attention de tous les instants, leur service irréprochable et leur constante bonne humeur tout au long de la soirée. C'est clairement ce qui a fait la différence et nous vous en remercions une fois encore !
text: This birthday evening on Sunday, May 12, however, got off to a bad start for reasons (relatively) beyond the control of the restaurant: The capricious weather of this bridge in May was first very sunny then rainy, leading respectively to an unexpected influx of customers (generating a shortage of products which were no longer available on the menu that evening) then the closure of the terrace (whose magnificent view was one of the main reasons for our visit). In short, the staff understands the situation and our frustration and is therefore very attentive to make us forget these inconveniences and so that we can have a good evening (6 glasses of champagne, 1 starter to share and 1 dessert offered, that's not all. is still not nothing). In the end, the dishes are delicious (the duck remains a reference, the salmon is not left out). And yet, at the time of departure, the most unforgettable experience will undoubtedly be the offer to have a last drink on the brand new roof terrace of the Tour d'Argent restaurant (located right next door), thus taking advantage of an even more impressive and magical view of Paris than initially expected. A very special mention to Wallid and his entire team for their constant attention, their impeccable service and their constant good humor throughout the evening. This is clearly what made the difference and we thank you once again!

original_text: J'ai passé un excellent moment avec mon fils résidant au Canada. Découverte de certaines saveurs avec un personnel de service compétent et charmant. Merci à toute l'équipe de la Tour D'Argent.
text: I had a great time with my son living in Canada. Discovery of certain flavors with competent and charming service staff. Thank you to the entire Tour D’Argent team.

original_text: Am comandat pulpa de rata cu cartofi care a fost incredibil de delicioasa, servirea Ft rapida ospătarul foarte politicos si vesel. Revenim cu drag ! Și desertul Tarte au citron magnifique tres bon! Merciii
text: I ordered the duck leg with potatoes which was incredibly delicious, the service was fast and the waiter was very polite and cheerful. We'll be back with love! And the Tarte au citron magnifique tres bon dessert. Thank you

original_text: Middag på Rotisserie d'Argent. Fejlfrie tallerkener fra køkkenet. Start med foie gras, bagefter kylling naturligvis 😊 Sluttede med ost, hvor den sorte brie var en virkelig gammel udgave, der smagte fantastisk. Lille vinkort med mange fine muligheder, til rimelige priser 🍷
text: Dinner at Rotisserie d'Argent. Flawless plates from the kitchen. Start with foie gras, then chicken of course 😊 Finished with cheese where the black brie was a really old version that tasted great. Small wine list with many fine options, at reasonable prices 🍷

original_text: 역사와 전통을 자랑하는 La tour d’argent을 예약하고 설레는 마음으로 파리에 왔습니다. 파리여행은 두 번째지만 신혼여행이기에 더 기대가 컸습니다. 제일 당황스럽고 실망했던 건 방문하기 전에 단 한번이라도 La tour d’argent은 renovation때문에 닫아서 이용할 수 없다는 소식을 받지 못했습니다. 예약시간에 맞춰 가보니 식당은 공사중이고 옆에 있는 La rotisserie d’argent만 이용 가능하다며 안내 받았습니다. 신혼 여행 중 제일 기대가 컸던 식당인 만큼 그 순간의 당황스러움은 말로 다 표현하기 힘들었습니다. 식당의 전통적인 음식뿐만 아니라 자랑스러운 와인 리스트들을 볼 생각에 전날 밤에도 어떤메뉴를 먹을지, 어떤 와인을 마셔야 잘 어울릴지 수도 없이 고민했는데 눈앞에서 그 행복을 빼앗긴 기분이었습니다. 게다가 제 와이프는 절 위해 입덧으로 힘든 와중에도 기꺼이 이곳까지 함께 와줬는데 정말 미안했습니다. 파리 여행을 악몽으로 바꿔줘서 고맙고 앞으로 평생 잊지 않을게요.
text: I came to Paris with excitement after booking La tour d’argent, which boasts history and tradition.  This was my second trip to Paris, but I had higher expectations because it was my honeymoon.  The most embarrassing and disappointing thing was that before my visit, I had not received even a single word that La tour d’argent was closed for renovation and could not be used.  When I arrived at the reservation time, I was informed that the restaurant was under construction and that only La rotisserie d’argent next door was available.  As this was the restaurant I was most looking forward to during my honeymoon, it was difficult to express my embarrassment at that moment in words.  I thought about not only the restaurant's traditional food but also its proud wine list, so the night before I thought countless times about what menu I would eat and what wine would go well with it, but I felt like that happiness was taken away right before my eyes.  Moreover, my wife willingly came here with me even though she was having a hard time with morning sickness, and I felt really sorry.  Thank you for turning my trip to Paris into a nightmare, and I will never forget you.

original_text: Nous avons passé un excellent moment. Encore un grand merci pour le service et les attentions que vous nous avez portées lors de ce déjeuner sur le pont de la Tournelle. Et bravo au chef!
text: We had a great time. Many thanks again for the service and attention you gave us during this lunch on the Pont de la Tournelle. And congratulations to the chef!

original_text: Le restaurant de tous les superlatifs : plus belle cave au monde, plus belle vue de Paris etc. La cuisine du chef est superbe, les équipes en salle hyper professionnelles et bienveillantes. Une étape obligatoire pour tous les amoureux du vin, d’autant que le menu du midi (même le samedi) coûte 105€ ! Sublime.
text: The restaurant of all superlatives: the most beautiful cellar in the world, the most beautiful view of Paris, etc. The chef's cuisine is superb, the dining room teams are extremely professional and caring. An obligatory stop for all wine lovers, especially since the lunch menu (even on Saturday) costs €105! Gorgeous.

original_text: Nous sommes allés à quatre en famille, menu classique de cuisine typiquement française. Bonne cuisine, bon vin et surtout personnel très attentif envers le client, mention spéciale pour le serveur Mr Oualid, qui nous a servi avec beaucoup de professionnalisme ! Merci et à la prochaine!
text: Four of us went as a family, classic menu of typically French cuisine. Good food, good wine and above all very attentive staff towards the customer, special mention for the waiter Mr Oualid, who served us with great professionalism! Thanks and see you next time!

original_text: Nous venons de feter nos 40 ans de mariage au sein de ce bel établisse. Félicitations pour l accueil, le service et le repas. Tout est excellent. Bravo aux équipes qui sont au petit soin des clients. Un des meilleurs restaurant de Paris. Félicitations a vous
text: We have just celebrated our 40th wedding anniversary in this beautiful establishment. Congratulations on the welcome, the service and the meal. Everything is excellent. Congratulations to the teams who take great care of customers. One of the best restaurants in Paris. Congratulations

original_text: Location da favola con vista su Notre Dame. Hanno una cantina caveau con migliaia di bottiglie. La carta dei vini è un tomo da circa 5 kg. Posto strepitoso, cibo pazzesco. L’anatra è il piatto forte con tanto di certificato consegnato a fine pasto. Straconsigliato
text: Fabulous location with a view of Notre Dame. They have a vault cellar with thousands of bottles. The wine list is a volume of about 5 kg. Amazing place, amazing food. The duck is the main dish complete with a certificate delivered at the end of the meal. Highly recommended

original_text: Un déjeuner magique et un rêve d'enfant parisien qui se réalise. La vue est encore plus magique que sur les photos et l'accueil, le service sont incroyablement encore au dessus ce que l'on peut attendre du restaurant parisien le plus connu au monde. Pour ce qui est de l'assiette aucun doute il s agit indéniablement de la plus haute gastronomie françaises, a chaque plat c'est une belle émotion et une parfaite maîtrise des produits. le canard est fort a propos présent a la carte du déjeuner. Nous sommes venu pour l'anniversaire de ma femme, cela restera un souvenir inoubliable, impossible de vivre cela ailleurs. Je tiens a remercier toute l'équipe de la tour d'argent de continuer a faire vivre au plus au niveau la restauration francaise.
text: A magical lunch and a Parisian childhood dream come true. The view is even more magical than in the photos and the welcome and the service are incredibly above what one would expect from the most famous Parisian restaurant in the world. As for the plate, there is no doubt that it is undeniably the highest French gastronomy, with each dish there is a beautiful emotion and a perfect mastery of the products. the duck is aptly present on the lunch menu.  We came for my wife's birthday, it will remain an unforgettable memory, impossible to experience it anywhere else.  I would like to thank the entire team at the Tour d'Argent for continuing to bring French catering to the highest level.

original_text: La soirée aurait pu très bien se finir si j’avais pas remarqué l’arnaque des serveurs a notre égard. Le repas était très savoureux mais je comprend absolument pas comment on peut embaucher des serveurs aussi incompétents. J’ai payé le double de ce que je devais payer et on peut pas me rembourser ? Heureusement que la personne qui m’avait accompagnée n’avait pas encore payé. Beaucoup trop de fautes professionnelle ou vol peut-être ? P.S: apprendre votre carte pour évitez de faire des A/R permanent.
text: The evening could have ended very well if I had not noticed the waiters' scam towards us. The meal was very tasty but I absolutely don't understand how you can hire such incompetent waiters. I paid double what I was supposed to pay and they can't refund me? Fortunately the person who accompanied me had not yet paid. Too much professional misconduct or theft perhaps?  P.S: learn your card to avoid making constant return trips.

original_text: Superbe expérience pour mon anniversaire, service ultra professionel, tout a été adapté sans gluten selon ma demande. Merci encore !
text: Superb experience for my birthday, ultra professional service, everything was adapted gluten-free according to my request. Thanks again !

original_text: Un clásico parisino de siempre. Con unas vistas espectaculares sobre el Sena, Notre Dame...etc Bonito local, buena atención y comida acorde, bien presentada y servida . Carta (mejor dicho libro) de vinos impresionante Por mi parte creo que se merece la segunda estrella michelin (solo tiene una ). Solo un detalle discordante : No nos gustó la combinación del caviar con flan que nos sirvieron y que lo distorsiona (admito que es cuestión de gustos). Precio aceptable si uno se ciñe al menú económico de la comida ( 105€/pax). Tema aparte son los extras (botella de chablis 92€ , caviar 175 € , 2 kir Royal 52€.....) Para darse un capricho en Paris Bastante recomendable.
text: A timeless Parisian classic. With spectacular views of the Seine, Notre Dame... etc. Nice place, good service and consistent food, well presented and served. Impressive wine list (or rather book). For my part, I think it deserves the second Michelin star (it only has one). Only one discordant detail: We did not like the combination of caviar with flan that they served us and that distorts it (I admit that it is a matter of taste). Acceptable price if one sticks to the economical lunch menu (€105/pax). A separate issue are the extras (bottle of chablis €92, caviar €175, 2 kir Royal €52.....) To treat yourself in Paris Highly recommended.

original_text: 絶品の鴨肉とエスカルゴを頂きました！！ また、フランスに行った折には、必ず食事に行きたいと思います！ 実は系列店のラトゥール ダルジャンと間違えて予約してしてしまい、入り口で迷っていたところレストランの支配人の方が隣のトゥールダルジャンへ出向いて、わざわざ今から入れないか交渉して下さいました。残念ながら、満席で入りませんでしたが、鴨は同じだよ。という言葉をいただき、早速鴨を丸ごと注文！こんなおいしい鴨は食べたことない！と言うくらい素晴らしい料理でした。皆様ぜひ行かれてください！
text: I had the exquisite duck meat and escargot! ! Also, when I go to France, I definitely want to go there for dinner! In fact, I mistakenly made a reservation for the affiliated restaurant, La Tour d'Argent, and as I was getting lost at the entrance, the restaurant manager went to the Tour d'Argent next door and negotiated with me to see if I could enter now. Unfortunately, it was full so I couldn't get in, but the duck is the same. After hearing this, I immediately ordered a whole duck! I have never eaten such delicious duck! It was such a wonderful dish. Everyone please go!

original_text: Un sans faute de l'accueil au départ : service impeccable, cuisine excellente, cadre magnifique. Une attention particulière a été apportée comme il s'agissait d'un événement particulier, ce qui nous a vraiment touchés. Bravo et merci pour ce moment magique !
text: A faultless welcome from the reception to departure: impeccable service, excellent cuisine, magnificent setting. Particular attention was paid as it was a special event, which really touched us. Bravo and thank you for this magical moment!

original_text: 1ere visite pour le dîner de la Saint Valentin. Foie gras très bon et goûteux, cela change de certains restaurants où il est fade, viande succulente. Par contre le dessert unique pour l'occasion était, à mon goût, trop sucré. Service impeccable. La formule bistrot fait que l'on est très près des autres tables, donc niveau intimité c'est juste, mais c'est le principe du bistrot. Il faut que j'y retourne pour goûter la carte
text: 1st visit for Valentine’s Day dinner. Very good and tasty foie gras, a change from some restaurants where it is bland, succulent meat. On the other hand, the unique dessert for the occasion was, for my taste, too sweet. Impeccable service. The bistro formula means that we are very close to the other tables, so in terms of privacy it is fair, but that is the principle of the bistro. I have to go back to taste the menu

original_text: トゥールダルジャンの系列店。トゥールダルジャンの隣にあります。 ランチでしたが、ボリューム満点です。鶏系が有名な店ですが、ビーフもありました。 とても店員さんはフレンドリーで、家内の誕生日が近いこともあって、食後のスイーツに花火をつけて、歌まで歌って祝ってもらえました。 ランチ時、満席状態ですので、予約は必ずした方がいいと思います。
text: An affiliated store of Tour d'Argent. It's next to the Tour d'Argent. It was lunch, but it was very filling. This restaurant is famous for its chicken dishes, but they also have beef. The staff was very friendly, and since my wife's birthday was coming up, they lit fireworks on the sweets after the meal and even sang a song to celebrate. It's always full at lunchtime, so it's best to make a reservation.

original_text: Une expérience inoubliable. L'accueil est d'une grande qualité alliant courtoisie et professionnalisme, les lieux sont magnifiques et la vue unique. Le restaurant récemment rénové est chaleureux et parfaitement insonorisé pour un moment plus intime et chaleureux La cuisine est divine, la carte des vins impressionnante.
text: An unforgettable experience. The welcome is of a high quality combining courtesy and professionalism, the places are magnificent and the view unique.  The recently renovated restaurant is warm and perfectly soundproofed for a more intimate and warm moment The cuisine is divine, the wine list impressive.

original_text: Magnifique vue depuis la salle privative. C’était bon, mais je m’attendais à mieux. Et le service peut laisser à désirer. Par exemple nous avions signalé qu’il manquait des mignardises à la fin. Cela a été constaté mais on ne nous a pas apporté les mignardises manquantes. De même, quelques détails de la salle font un peu négligé, pas au top!
text: Magnificent view from the private room. It was good, but I expected better. And the service can leave something to be desired. For example, we pointed out that some sweet treats were missing at the end. This was noted but we were not brought the missing treats. Likewise, some details of the room are a little neglected, not at the top!

original_text: Le cadre est sympa, dans un esprit de brasserie tradi avec des nappes en vichy à table. En apéritif, on nous sert des rillettes de porc maison. C’est très très bon. Mention spéciale pour l'œuf mayo champion du monde (9€) ! La cuisson de l'œuf est nickel, la mayonnaise bien assaisonnée se tient parfaitement. L'œuf est posé sur un socle de pomme de terre qui ajoute une texture supplémentaire à l’entrée. Les plats sont généreux, appétissants et canailles, le tout à un prix correct. La saucisse de chez Conquet (21€) nous a conquis. On goûte aussi le pigeonneau (42€), une grande première. C’est une jolie découverte, où le muscovado adoucit la viande et fait le lien avec les carottes. Pour accompagner le repas, une bonne tradition bien cuite et un pain aux fruits qui viennent de chez @leboulangerdelatour. Vraiment la porte à côté. On a tous opté pour le dessert du jour, le millefeuille vanille & cacahuètes (10€) ! Bien garni d’une jolie crème pâtissière, la pâte est croustillante, le mélange cacahuète-caramel rappelle le goût des chouchous. Régressif. Un joli repas du dimanche dans une brasserie traditionnelle chaleureuse, avec des plats de qualité et un service sobre et efficace.
text: The setting is nice, in the spirit of a traditional brasserie with gingham tablecloths at the table. As an aperitif, we are served homemade pork rillettes. It's very very good.  Special mention for the world champion egg mayo (€9)! The cooking of the egg is perfect, the well-seasoned mayonnaise holds together perfectly. The egg is placed on a potato base which adds additional texture to the starter.  The dishes are generous, appetizing and cheeky, all at a fair price. The sausage from Conquet (€21) won us over. We also taste the squab (€42), a great first. It’s a nice discovery, where the muscovado softens the meat and creates a link with the carrots.  To accompany the meal, a good, well-cooked tradition and a fruit bread from @leboulangerdelatour. Really next door.  We all opted for the dessert of the day, the vanilla & peanut millefeuille (€10)! Well garnished with a pretty pastry cream, the dough is crispy, the peanut-caramel mixture recalls the taste of chouchou. Regressive.  A lovely Sunday meal in a warm, traditional brasserie, with quality dishes and simple, efficient service.

original_text: L'expérience que nous avons vécue lors d'un repas offert par nos enfants, avec vins compris a été tout à fait appréciée, et remarquable. Dès la phase de confirmation de notre réservation par téléphone, nous avons été très bien accueillis. Lors de notre arrivée, le personnel du service de vestiaire et d'accueil était très professionnel, avec des amuse-bouches excellents, avant que nous ne soyons guidés jusqu'à la salle de restaurant. Le placement dans la salle renovée du restaurant panoramique a permis à chacun des convives de profiter d'une vue exceptionnelle sur Paris, et l'ïle de la cité en particulier. Un des aspects les plus appréciés a été le choix des vins, en accord avec les différents mets proposés, et également après une discussion agréable et passionnante avec le sommelier. Les produits mis en valeur par l'équipe de cuisine ont été réellement appréciés : subtil mélange de traditions, d'innovations, de textures et de couleurs, assurant un régal des yeux et du palais. Le service a été attentionné, discret et efficace. L'intervention du propriétaire du restaurant, rappelant brièvement l'histoire familiale attachée au lieu, a été à la fois bienvenue, discrète, et un témoignage apprécié d'un "esprit de famille" perceptible dans les interactions visiblement en confiance de l'ensemble des personnes en salle, au service des invités. Un sans-faute, témoignage d'un management visiblement respectueux des personnes, et d'une histoire. Merci et bravo !
text: The experience we had during a meal offered by our children, with wine included, was completely appreciated and remarkable. From the confirmation phase of our reservation by telephone, we were very well received. When we arrived, the cloakroom and reception staff were very professional, with excellent appetizers, before we were guided to the dining room. The placement in the renovated room of the panoramic restaurant allowed each of the guests to enjoy an exceptional view of Paris, and the island of the city in particular. One of the most appreciated aspects was the choice of wines, in accordance with the different dishes offered, and also after a pleasant and fascinating discussion with the sommelier. The products highlighted by the kitchen team were really appreciated: a subtle blend of traditions, innovations, textures and colors, ensuring a feast for the eyes and the palate. The service was attentive, discreet and efficient.   The intervention of the restaurant owner, briefly recalling the family history attached to the place, was both welcome, discreet, and an appreciated testimony of a "family spirit" perceptible in the visibly trusting interactions of the whole people in the room, serving the guests. A flawless performance, testimony to management visibly respectful of people and history. Thank you and well done!
